channel.title: Golang on YA blog
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on YA blog

item.title: Removing item(s) from a slice, while iterating in Go
item.description: How easy would it be to remove item(s) from a slice, while iterating that slice? It seems to be a trivial task, so lets see how to accomplish this in Go programming language.

item.title: Better pull requesting into Go project
item.description: Once upon a time, I’ve decided to contribute to an open source project written in Go. I thought no problem, fork it, make a change then pull request. Sounds good, but it wasn’t such a smooth experience.
